subject: NBA Championship
Basketball
lead_paragraph: In an unforgettable Game 6 of the Finals in June, the San Antonio Spurs were within 28.32 seconds of their fifth title, but the Miami Heat somehow forced overtime and then won the game.
snippet: In an unforgettable Game 6 of the Finals in June, the San Antonio Spurs were within 28.32 seconds of their fifth title, but the Miami Heat somehow forced overtime and then won the game.
